cloud_kingdom.name: The Cloud Kingdom
cloud_kingdom.description: A magnificent realm of floating islands connected by bridges of condensed cloud. The Cloud Kingdom is ruled by the Cloud King and is home to the most powerful sky dwellers.

storm_peaks.name: The Storm Peaks
storm_peaks.description: Towering mountain peaks where eternal storms rage. Only the bravest warriors dare to climb these dangerous heights where lightning strikes continuously.

star_sanctuary.name: The Star Sanctuary
star_sanctuary.description: A sacred realm where the sky meets the stars. This peaceful sanctuary is home to celestial beings and contains ancient knowledge from the stars themselves.

void_gap.name: The Void Gap
void_gap.description: A dangerous rift in the sky where the boundary between realms weakens. Dark energies seep through, creating twisted versions of sky creatures.

ethereal_expanse.name: The Ethereal Expanse
ethereal_expanse.description: The vast endless sky that connects all realms of the Ether. Here, the laws of physics bend and the horizon stretches into infinity.

celestial_observatory.name: The Celestial Observatory
celestial_observatory.description: An ancient structure built atop the highest cloud island, used to study the movements of stars and predict the weather of the Ether.
